title: Effects of Neutron-Antineutron Transitions in Neutron Stars
authors:
Itzhak Goldman, Rabindra N. Mohapatra, Shmuel Nussinov, and Robert
  Shrock
abstract:
We analyze effects of neutron-antineutron transitions in neutron stars,
specifically on (i) cooling, (ii) rotation rate, and (iii) for binary pulsars,
the increase in the orbital period. We show that these effects are negligibly
small.
